sentences.cn: 再次, 出台明确的惩戒标准.

sentences.en: As many as I love, I rebuke and chasten . Therefore be zealous and repent.
sentences.cn: 19凡我所疼爱的, 我就责备管教他; 所以你要发热心,也要悔改.

sentences.en: As many as I love, I rebuke and chasten: be zealous therefore, and repent.
sentences.cn: 19凡我所疼爱的, 我就责备 管教 他.所以你要发热心, 也要悔改.

sentences.en: As many as I love, I rebuke chasten: be zealous therefore, and repent.
sentences.cn: 凡我所疼爱的 、 我就责备 管教 他所以你要发热心 、 也要悔改.

sentences.en: For tomorrow's success, chasten ourselves today.
sentences.cn: 为了明天的成就, 今天就磨练自己.——张沁.

sentences.en: It is the preparation to make exercise, chasten will.
sentences.cn: 锻炼身体,强壮体魄, 磨练意志也是准备.

sentences.en: LORD, rebuke me not in thine anger, neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.
sentences.cn: 耶和华阿, 求你不要在怒中责备我, 也不要在烈怒中惩罚我.

sentences.en: O Lord , do not rebuke me in Your anger, Nor chasten me in Your wrath.
sentences.cn: 诗6:1〔卫的诗、与伶长、丝弦的乐器 、 用第八.〕和华阿、你不要在怒中责备我 、 不要在烈怒中惩罚我.

sentences.en: O Lord, rebuke me not in Your wrath, And chasten me not in Your burning anger.
sentences.cn: 诗38:1〔大卫的纪念诗.〕耶和华阿 、 求你不要在怒中责备我.不要在烈怒中惩罚我.

sentences.en: Party workers have returned to their home towns, chastened by their overwhelming defeat.
sentences.cn: 党务工作者遭受惨败后打道回府。

sentences.en: So from now on, make yourself life as a man. chasten a tough heart.
sentences.cn: 从现在开始, 让自己活得像个男人. 磨练一颗坚强的心.

trans.tran_en: to make someone realize that their behaviour was wrong or mistaken

trans.tran_cn: 惩罚（某人）（使之改正或改进），惩戒，遏制（某人），制止
